Private Litigation Case Title: Romero et al v. Mountaire Farms, Inc.
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/419447/mountaire-farms-puts-up-8m-to-settle-don-doff-suit

Private Litigation Case Title: Perez et al v. Mountaire Farms, Inc et al
Notes: A consent decree judgment was issued by the district court judge after the original judgement was taken by the company to the U.S. Court of Appeals, which partly affirmed and partly reversed it.

Description: Mountaire Farms agreed to pay a $420,000 civil penalty and $25,000 costs in settlement of allegations it violated state water pollution laws.
Agency: Delaware Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Control
Info Source: http://www.dnrec.delaware.gov/Info/Documents/agreement-and-proposed-consent-decree-dnrec-and-mountaire-20191213.pdf

Description: Amended Order supercedes Order 2008-A-0004. New penalty of $5k, cost recovery still $1500, addition of EIP w/minimum cost of $10k.
Agency: Delaware Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Control
Info Source: http://www.nav.dnrec.delaware.gov/DEN3/Detail/EnforcementDetail.aspx?id=11184
https://mde.maryland.gov/programs/Pressroom/Pages/042612environmentalenforcementviolations.aspx

Description: To resolve a case involving wastewater contamination, poultry producer Mountaire Corporation agreed to spend $140 million to upgrade its pollution controls. In a related class action lawsuit, it also created a $65 million fund to resolve allegations that its disposal practices harmed residents (see separate entry).
Agency: Delaware Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Control
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/1374330/del-chicken-plant-inks-205m-deal-to-end-pollution-suits

Description: Poultry producer Mountaire Corporation agreed to create a $65 million fund to resolve allegations that its disposal of wastewater and sludge at a Delaware facility contaminated property and harmed residents. It reached a separate agreement with the state under which it would spend $140 million to upgrade its pollution controls (see separate entry).
Private Litigation Case Title: Cuppels et al. v. Mountaire Corp. et al.
Info Source: https://www.law360.com/articles/1374330/del-chicken-plant-inks-205m-deal-to-end-pollution-suits
